Ingredients:
Baby spinach leaves, thoroughly washed Big bag of mixed salad leaves including plenty of herbs Blanched fine beans Big bunch of fresh basil Cooked pasta - the twirly ones are nice with this Handfull of freshly grated parmesan cheese Black olives - pitted Fresh black pepper Strips of chicken breast 2 cloves of garlic, finely chopped.
This is a very easy one: Take one good non-stick pan. Melt in a knob of butter and a little olive oil over a medium head. Add the garlic and fry gently for a minute. Add the chicken and some basil. Fry for around 10 minutes or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked.
Then, and this is the tricky part - put all the ingredients into a big bowl with a desert spoon of pesto and mix.
As always - serve with crusty bread and Pinot Grigio.
